meanings.sent1: The scannable document was easily read by the machine.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the barcode is scannable before checking out.
meanings.sent3: The scannable paper made the photocopier very happy.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like scannable lasers, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The scannable image on the screen was crystal clear.

meanings.definition: Able to be read or processed by a scanner.
meanings.sent1: The scannable QR code led us to the website.
meanings.sent2: Is this document scannable for our records?
meanings.sent3: The scannable ticket saved us from waiting in line.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a scannable database of information.
meanings.sent5: The scannable text was quickly converted into digital format.
